title: Clean & Remodeled Studio / ALL Utilities Included  / PETS OKAY!
posting_body: ['Call or text Salvador', 'show contact info', '\u202aDate Available: NOW\u202c', '\u202aPrice: $1,525', '\u202aBedroom: Studio', '\u202aPet Policy: Cats and Dogs allowed with additional deposit and pet rent', '\u202aThis is a Charming Remodeled Studio in the heart of Downtown LA.', 'Across the street from LA Film Center Studios.', 'This is an Artsy Community Building with an onsite Cleaning Lady!.', '\u202aThis building is located 3 Blocks from 24 Hour Fitness, Target, Metro Rail, and tons of Restaurants.', 'Starbucks arnd grocery stores are walking distance as well.', 'This cozy remodeled single features: new floors, built in closet space, large new kitchen countertop, lots of cabinets, and a mini fridge that is available upon request.', 'There is laundry onsite, a professional manager, and walking distance to shopping, restaurants, freeways and many bus lines.', '\u202c', '\u202aThis building is PET FRIENDLY', '\u202aPet deposit is $300.00', '\u202aPet rent: $30.00 per month', '463 S Bixel St, Los Angeles, CA 90017\u202c', '\u202aCall or text Salvador', 'show contact info']
